item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1249; 03:42PM; 10721 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OhTMcL; Toluca Lake; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 15 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details. ; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E76 E86 RA86 T60 T78; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1249; 03:27PM; 10721 W Moorpark St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OhTMcL; Toluca Lake; One story, single family dwelling (vacant, previous burn) with heavy smoke showing. There are no additional structures threatened. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E60 E86 RA86 T60; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic; INC#0857; 12:32PM; 10261 N Corbin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AohzC6; Chatsworth; A total of three patients were transported with two in at least serious condition (one required extrication) and one with minor injuries. No further patient details. Any questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 1850; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E70 E8 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA104 RA70 RA72 RA903 RA91 T87 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#0857; 12:01PM; 10261 N Corbin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AohzC6; Chatsworth; Multiple vehicle collision with three patients - two are (in one vehicle) in at least serious condition with one requiring extrication. The third patient was in a separate vehicle and sustained minor, non-life threatening injuries. Traffic will be closed on Devonshire at Oakdale and Melvin - drivers are advised to seek alternate routes. LAPD Inc# 1850; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E70 E8 EM15 HR3 RA70 RA91 T87 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0833; 12:01AM; 421 E 62nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TK7d6m; Florence; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 15 minutes with no injuries reported. LA DWP is being requested to respond for wires down. The fire was starting to extend to the 2 story apartment building but firefighters quick actions halted it. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 E21 E221 E233 E33 RA33 RA833 T21 T33; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0833; 11:46AM; 519 E 61st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tE5fJX; Florence; Multiple vehicles (exact number unknown at this time) on fire in a carport which is exposing the 2 story, garden style apartment building. Firefighters are making fire attack against the vehicles while additional crews are entering the structure to ensure no extension.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 E21 E221 E233 E33 RA33 RA833 T21 T33; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0543; 09:44AM; 1500 N Schuyler Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OumbfP; Beverly Crest; With firefighters now having handlines 100% around the fire, it is updated to less than 1/4 acre with NO structures threatened. They are mopping up the fire and the majority of resources expected to be released shortly. No injuries reported and no structures damaged.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC18 BC705 CM40 CM42 CW3A E108 E27 E278 E290 E41 E43 E58 E76 E90 E99 EM5 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 HT3 RA78 T78 T90; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0543; 09:13AM; 1500 N Schuyler Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OumbfP; Beverly Crest; Small area burning (less than 1/2 acre) in heavy brush. There is one structure threatened at this time. No additional resources are anticipated to be required. Firefighters are working to make access.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC18 BC705 CM40 CM42 CW3A E108 E27 E278 E290 E41 E43 E58 E76 E90 E99 EM5 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 HT3 RA78 T78 T90; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0351; 08:07AM; 1431 S Warnall Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hPapjE; Westwood; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 44 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is an ascending, hillside home (with basement) with two stories in the front and one in back. Firefighters located the fire in a basement level apartment. While smoke was showing from the attic vents, thorough investigation determined no extension into the attic space. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E237 E292 E37 E59 E71 RA92 T37 T92; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0351; 07:23AM; 1431 S Warnall Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hPapjE; Westwood; Two story, single family dwelling with light to moderate smoke showing. One additional task force requested (not reflected in this alert). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E37 E71 RA92 T92; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart
